allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Replace mock data with real database integration throughout dashboard

- Updated dashboard to fetch real claims data from Firestore
- Replaced hardcoded statistics with real calculations from user claims
- Updated recent activity to show actual claim-based activity
- Modified claims list page to use real database queries with loading/error states
- Fixed individual claim detail pages to fetch real claim data
- Added getVeteranClaim function for secure claim access
- Removed debug components (AuthDebug, /debug page) from production
- Improved error handling and loading states across all pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix dashboard to not show error when user has no claims

- Updated claims loading logic to treat empty claims array as normal
- Changed error message to be more specific about database connection issues
- Users with no claims now see friendly "No Claims Yet" message instead of error
- Applied fix to both dashboard and claims list pages

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
